short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the latest NASA APOD image when you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you love space, astrophotography or just inspiring photographs, this extension replaces the boring plain new tab screen with images from NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day archive. The extension also includes details of the epic images you'll enjoy looking at so you can learn more about space too before browsing the web!
